sections.text: A tremor reveals a new entrance to the Emberfall caverns beneath your town.

options.description: Gather a team and enter the caverns.
Report the entrance to the town council.

sections.text: Inside, the air is hot and the path splits into three tunnels.

options.description: Take the left tunnel with faint blue light.
Take the center tunnel with echoing drips.
Take the right tunnel with warm gusts.

sections.text: The council forbids exploration. You must decide whether to obey or sneak out at night.

options.description: Obey the council and stay away.
Sneak out with a lantern and rope.

sections.text: The blue light is from crystals. One shatters and sprays shards.

options.description: Shield your face and press on.

sections.text: The drips lead to an underground lake with a small boat tied to a post.

options.description: Use the boat to cross the lake.
Search the shore for another path.

sections.text: Warm gusts carry the scent of sulfur. You find a sleeping fire-serpent curled around a glowing egg.

options.description: Try to steal the egg quietly.

consequence.text: The serpent wakes and scorches you.

options.description: Back away slowly and leave the egg.

sections.text: You obey the council. Months later, the town prospers as the caverns remain sealed.
Despite the injury, you reach a chamber of ancient machinery that hints at a lost civilization.
Crossing the lake, you discover a subterranean city and become its first visitor in centuries.
A hidden tunnel leads you to a cache of old maps and a safe route outâ€”knowledge to protect your town.
You fail to take the egg. The serpent's fury forces a hasty retreat; you survive but are forever marked.
